channel.title: Change "pitch" sample WAV
channel.description: Hello everyone, I'm Italian and my English is not perfect. Sorry Soon I buy a axoloti but I have a question. Is it possible to change the "pitch" or "tone" of a sample Wav? I think there is a need for tables. has anyone already done this?

item.title: Change "pitch" sample WAV
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Did you check the facotry library?

There are tables, both non-interpolated tables as well as interpolated tables, the are basic play tables and more "real" tables. So table side is covered.

If you just want simple playback of a sample and the ability to change the pitch of that sample, try out te object called table/play pitch, it does exactly that. There are help files to get you started, push the small triangle in the top right corner of the object and push "help".

Read full topic
